error.title: Update your profile first
error.message: In order to be able to exchange with other users you need first to update your profile with your game and server info.

footer.title: Thanks for using Dofaddicts!
footer.text: We value your help in improving translations and appreciate any ideas you may have. Contact me if you want to contribute for making our content better for all users.

harvest.description: In Dofaddicts you will find a tool to manage your harvest, and exchange your nulls with other players
